Blog.post: Well things jus appear after the holidae N after the Mt.Ophir trip.jus came bk from camp need to go to skool the naxt dae.So unfair!! Than skool wor k have not done!Hmph.Jus gotta live wif it then.Then on the 2nd dae of the 1st week on the 2nd smestr of skool,ma bro was amitted to hospital.His lung collasped again.This is the 2nd time he was in hospital.0k0k enough bout him.The week after that ma Track N Field competition starts.It was ma 4x100meters relay. Pahisey2!! I was the last runner,and i need to cause to make for the quick run but then the 3rd runner was slow i could'nt catch up with other skool.Then tat afternoon i went back to skool helped out wif ma malay project,when i realized that Fiez did not turn up at skool.Her lil'sis said that she was sick.Bla3...I also manage to go have a hair cut,went bk to skool continue ma malay project then went home...Saturdae N sunday haf rest.Mondae did not turn up skool cause got ma Track N Field again.I came at cck stadium N found out that the skool's npcc was there.I'm su happy cause ma frienz were able to see me run the 200meters run.But it was a dissapointing run.The npcc went bk to skool by bus.So iwent bk to skool alone.HAd ma maths remedial.Then after that got sum pro to settle.It was dian N mar.They were fighting over sumthing.During the so called ''Court session".i wa quite annoyin' i made most of the tyme a laughin' session!!Then after tat one of our fren Storm down.She got sume family pros'Hmm thats it 4 now i'll continue some other tyme....

Well things jus appear after the holidae N after the Mt.Ophir trip.jus came bk from camp need to go to skool the naxt dae.So unfair!!Than skool work have not done!Hmph.Jus gotta live wif it then.Then on the 2nd dae of the 1st week on the 2nd smestr of skool,ma bro was amitted to hospital.His lung collasped again.This is the 2nd time he was in hospital.0k0k enough bout him.The week after that ma Track N Field competition starts.It was ma 4x100meters relay.Pahisey2!!I was the last runner,and i need to cause to make for the quick run but then the 3rd runner was slow i could'nt catch up with other skool.Then tat afternoon i went back to skool helped out wif ma malay project,when i realized that Fiez did not turn up at skool.Her lil'sis said that she was sick.Bla3...I also manage to go have a hair cut,went bk to skool continue ma malay project then went home...Saturdae N sunday haf rest.Mondae did not turn up skool cause got ma Track N Field again.I came at cck stadium N found out that the skool's npcc was there.I'm su happy cause ma frienz were able to see me run the 200meters run.But it was a dissapointing run.The npcc went bk to skool by bus.So iwent bk to skool alone.HAd ma maths remedial.Then after that got sum pro to settle.It was dian N mar.They were fighting over sumthing.During the so called ''Court session".i wa quite annoyin' i made most of the tyme a laughin' session!!Then after tat one of our fren Storm down.She got sume family pros'Hmm thats it 4 now i'll continue some other tyme....
